attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. The new facelifted Honda Amaze. The All New Honda Amaze Comfort model features a new 7''touchscreen infotainment system with Android Auto and Apple CarPlay. For added convenience the new infotainment system incorporates a reverse parking camera on the comfort model, while rear park distance control is now a standard feature. Upgraded new interior to black. A brand new front grille, new 15" diamond-cut alloy wheels and LED Front Fog Lights. Legendary fuel efficiency on the renowned 1.2 liter engine. Come see for yourself the great build quality and reliability.
This vehicle includes a factory warranty of 5 year / 200000km, 2 year /30000km service plan and 3 year roadside assistance. 
Book your test drive today!

Finance available to all approved buyers, Trade in's Welcome and Delivery Nationwide.
